@RotoDoc I never recovered properly from my last surgery, just suck it up and play with a knee sleeve, so I think I'm close to a coin-flip
Joining a league after being washed and sedentary for years will either get me back into shape or kill me, so it should be a fun adventure
Playing basketball for the first time in a couple of years on Thursday and I'm not sure if I expect my knees or lungs to give out first

Don't confuse your privilege of being able to afford to work for free with being "hard working and determined"
It also sucks to see big names in the industry romanticizing working for free. That is part of why companies get away with not paying
But that doesn't mean publications are justified in not paying writers and excusing it as "that's how you break into the industry"
I was privileged enough to be able to write for free when I started doing this as a hobby. If you're able to do that of course it's viable
